scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:client" "npm run dev:api-gateway" "npm run dev:auth-service" "npm run dev:user-service"
scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=shared && npm run build --workspace=client && npm run build --workspace=api-gateway && npm run build --workspace=auth-service && npm run build --workspace=user-service
scripts.test: npm run test --workspace=client && npm run test --workspace=api-gateway && npm run test --workspace=auth-service && npm run test --workspace=user-service
scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspace=client && npm run lint --workspace=api-gateway && npm run lint --workspace=auth-service && npm run lint --workspace=user-service
